verbs.description: another former top raiders draft pick could be set to join amari cooper on cowboys former oakland raiders second - round pick safety obi melifonwu is visiting the dallas cowboys for a workout after being waived by oakland adam schefter jeff heath espn adelaide raiders oakland raider raiders draft kavon frazier xavier woods oakland raiders obi melifonwu amari cooper dallas cowboys
